text: @MattHancock @SkyNews I admire Rt Hon Boris Johnson for his service to British Nation. Today,I'm worried as I see his video message. History:Coronavirus symptoms for 9 days.Examination by video:Less pink face than his usual colour.Investigations, diagnosis of complications,treatment,sick leave needed?
